thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 54 of 3060
thread.title: Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text: I booked a car with full protection, but soon after realized it wasn't full protection through the car hire company. I then read some bad reviews about not getting money refunded so was worried I wouldn't get the full protection money back after I cancelled that portion of the return. But within 2 days, the money was back in my account. That was reassuring. But I will be double checking that all is in order with the car hire company prior to pick up, just to be sure.
